REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to the issuance of a New York State Vietnam War Service Medal
Summary: Relates to the issuance of a New York State Vietnam War Service Medal.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to the issuance of a New York State Vietnam War Service Medal
